hero.name: Supratik Chakraborty
hero.headline: Software Engineer (Full-Stack) @ Trumio
hero.description: Building enterprise-SaaS platforms with a focus on admin governance, analytics, and compliance-first architectures. Experienced in designing multi-tenant systems, RBAC implementations, and LLM-powered automation pipelines. Working with FastAPI, React, MongoDB, and Azure to deliver scalable solutions that reduce operational overhead and improve enterprise workflows.

experience.description: Building enterprise-grade admin governance platforms and analytics infrastructure for AI-powered talent management solutions serving 5 enterprise customers (~500 users).
highlights: Architected a multi-tenant, audit-ready admin backend with RBAC, license enforcement, and policy-driven workflows; reduced manual operational overhead by ~35%
Built authorization-aware analytics services for managerial evaluation and reporting with strict tenant isolation; improved stakeholder decision cycles by ~40%
Designed a resilient analytics ingestion layer integrating Google Analytics and Hotjar with schema validation and fault tolerance; increased behavioral data coverage by ~70%
Orchestrated a backend processing pipeline handling 200â€“300 PRs/feedback records per month with PII masking and NDA boundaries; cut manual review effort by ~50%
Owned backend delivery for 10+ production releases with bi-weekly deployments; cut post-release incidents by ~30%
Initiated a 40+ component internal design system distributed as an npm package; improved UI consistency and optimized frontend delivery time by ~20%

experience.description: Enhanced and maintained backend scraping infrastructure and data pipelines for real-estate data aggregation from government portals.
highlights: Enhanced web scraping pipelines using BeautifulSoup to extract structured data from 20+ government real-estate portals
Implemented distributed ingestion workflows with Celery + RabbitMQ processing 100+ records per run
Integrated Keycloak for secure, role-based access control across the platform

projects.title: Chessvine
projects.description: AI Chess Analysis Platform powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash on GCP Cloud Run + Cloud Tasks, processing 20 files/batch with 15s latency and auto-generating 2 puzzles/game for personalized training. Full-stack SaaS with 15+ dashboard views, 12 API endpoints, and Google OAuth; deployed with 99.5% uptime via Dockerized Cloud Build CI/CD.

contact.message: Open to conversations about full-stack engineering roles, AI-integrated product development, or tackling complex enterprise challenges together.
